column2: We must throw aside the aristocracy and monarchy that forces us to fight their expansionist wars. Let us fight for our liberty, let us be free!
We will reach out to our fellow citizens across the isles yearning to breathe free.
We have beaten out the last remenants of the monarchist armies, time to finally focus on home.
We are a bastion of liberty and oppertunity for the people of this earth. Let us put out a campaing, advertising the security and oppertunity of our island Federal Republic.
Our liberties and oppertunity combined with a strong campaign for immigration ensure many who seak a better life will come to our shores.
We will encourage more births with small social and financial incentives, at some strain to our education system.
Births have increased, but so has the strain on our education system.
We will encourage a reduced birth rate to alleviate the strain on our education systems.
Birth have decreased, decreasing the strain on our education system.
We cannot spare the resources to have a large international presence, our efforts are better focused at home.
We are focussing on domestic matters at the expense of those outside our borders.
Whilst our upperhouse my obstruct our desired reforms, we can stoke the populous into action to get our desired change. Lets hope they stay on target.
Our people are lobbying hard for reform, their frustrations are rising.
We must invest in the suburbs and rural areas of our provinces, to better support a safe and stable way of life that can be afforded with our more modern technology.
We are currently using a significant proportion of our production and tax revenue to improve the living quality of our less developed areas.
